title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20 §§ 8186-3.3 - Notice of anticipated material change in level of assessment
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20 §§ 8186-3.3 - Notice of anticipated material change in level of assessment

State Regulations

An assessor who anticipates a material change in level of
assessment on the assessment roll of the assessing unit or any municipality
within the assessing unit for which the assessor is responsible, shall file
with ORPTS a written notice of such anticipated material change in level of
assessment not later than 30 days prior to the last date set by law for the
filing of the final assessment roll. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20
§§
8186-3.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
